newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese shares mixed, focus on PT, Somague.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese shares mixed, focus on PT, Somague.

text.p: Portuguese shares closed mixed with activity focused on Portugal Telecom, which rose after the higher opening of Wall Street, and construction firm Somague which fell 10 percent after news it had held talks with A.Silva & Silva about a possible exchange of shares.
* PT represented 15 percent of the total turnover on Lisbon bourse of 5.7 billion escudos today.
* Dealers said they were reluctant to predict the trend for tomorrow and that it may depend on the close of Wall Street.
